options.name: chdir
options.comments: Change into this directory before running the command.

options.name: creates
options.comments: A filename or (since 2.0) glob pattern, when it already exists, this step will not be run.

options.name: free_form
options.comments: The command module takes a free form command to run. There is no parameter actually named 'free form'. See the examples!

options.name: removes
options.comments: If command_warnings are on in ansible.cfg, do not warn about this particular line if set to no.
